name: In The Hall Of The Magnet King
name_original: In The Hall Of The Magnet King
description: This is my first game, (which was made for Lost Relic/John Stejskal's Game Jam under the theme "connection"). My main aim here was just to finish making a game, and within a deadline. As a result it's not exactly a work of art and many corners had to be cut despite it's deceivable façade of simplicity to make. Despite it being questionably short and understandably rushed, I'm pleased to call it my first game.
